Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Mike Crabtree "Constitutional Guard Dog"
Reviews.Content: Happily this phone is exactly as advertised. It is a Developer Edition 32gb unlocked for 414.00.Delivery was within 4 days of purchase.Give 5 stars for product and service.

ProductInfo.Features:
Display:4.7" AMOLED (RGB) / HD 720p
2 GB RAM, 32 GB storage. Battery type: 2200 mAh. Mixed usage up to 24 hours
Front Camera: 2MP 1080p HD video, Rear-Facing Camera: 10MP CLEAR PIXEL (RGBC) - Quick Capture - LED flash - 1080p HD video (30 fps) - 4X digital zoom - Slow motion video - Burst mode - Auto HDR - Panorama - Tap to focus
3G UMTS bands: 850/900/ AWS/1900/2100 MHz with HSPA+ up to 42 Mbps (B5/B8/B4/B2/B1)
4G LTE bands:700/AWS/1900MHz (B17/B4/B2), Wi-Fi: 802.11a/g/b/n/ac (dual band capable), mobile hotspot
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola Moto X Developer Edition - 32gb - Black/woven White (Unlocked)
